caption.title: Reference information for the genetic variants assessed.

tr.th: Coordinates of genetic locus in reference entry
Position of mutation in reference locus

tr.td: N/A (assessed nucleotide similarity across the full locus with a threshold of ≤ 90%)*

fn.p: *Isolates with a porA pseudogene with ≤90% similarity to the NC_011035.1 porA pseudogene were called positive for N. meningitidis-like porA. Note that all such isolates were confirmed to have a porA pseudogene that was ≥92% similar to the N. meningitidis porA (GenBank Accession: GQ173789.1), while all other isolates had ≤89% similarity to the N. meningitidis porA.
